[`Reference`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Reference.md)

## Reference interface

Base interface for items that point to a different location.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Reference 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`displayText?`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Reference/displayText.md) |  | <code>string</code> | _(Optional)_ Available if title is different from link text, in the case of <code>[[page name&#124;display name]]</code> this will return <code>display name</code> |
|  [`link`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Reference/link.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Link destination. |
|  [`original`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Reference/original.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Contains the text as it's written in the document. Not available on Publish. |
